ref: 5795 tāraṇa n. ʻ crossing, safe passage, surmounting of difficulties ʼ MBh. &rcirclemacr Pk. tāraṇa -- n. ʻ taking across ʼ; N. tāran ʻ the sending across ʼ (tiran -- tāran ʻ squaring of accounts ʼ, sāran -- tāran ʻ mutual giving and taking ʼ); G. tāraṇ n. ʻ taking across, preservation, deposited pledge ʼ; M. tāraṇ n. ʻ deposit made against a debt or other agreement ʼ.
